titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Leland Phelps Collection of Faulkneriana RL.11116
titlestmt.author: Meghan Lyon

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2016-01-29 16:42:35 -0500.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Leland Phelps was a professor of German Language and Literature at Duke University, who also actively collected nineteenth- and twentieth century American literature. This collection contains assorted serials and other miscellaneous items, including a scrapbook, from his collection on William Faulkner.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: Numerous single periodical issues with content on Faulkner, scrapbook of photographs of Faulkner-related locales in Oxford, Mississippi, and 2 cassettes.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Leland Phelps was a Duke professor in the Germanic Language and Literature Department (faculty member, 1961-1985 and department chair, 1970-1983) who also collected American literature. The majority of Phelps' gift to the Rubenstein Library has been cataloged individually as print items.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Original audiovisual materials are closed to use. Contact Research Services in advance of your visit to request the production of listening copies.
Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Collection acquired as a gift from Leland Phelps in 2013. Accessions represented in this collection guide: 2016-0006.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Leland Phelps Collection of Faulkneriana, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.unittitle: Clippings and serials about William Faulkner
Clippings and serials with writings by William Faulkner
Scrapbook with photographs of Faulkner's grave, etc., in Oxford, Mississippi

accessrestrict.p: Original audiovisual materials are closed to use. Contact Research Services in advance of your visit to request the production of listening copies.
